ejcramphorn: When I was in the grips of anorexia people did actually say that I should just eat more/eat a burger/stop being dramatic/just gain weight, and it used to absolutely infuriate me because it’s not that simple. I got shitty comments when I was sick but I also got a fuck ton of praise for having self control and people wanting to know “my secret.” So to the people reading this who think “yeah I’d say something similar to somebody thin with anorexia” please realise that that is inadequate justification for being fatphobic, and that perpetuating weight stigma causes more harm than telling somebody with anorexia to just eat.
